title: [Caffe2] modify op in the net from init and predict files
body_html:
I have a trained model stored as init.pb and predict.pb files.
I load them successfully and print predict.
one of the operations appears to be:

op {  
  input: "300" 
  input: "298"
  output: "301"
  name: ""
  type: "Add"
  arg {
    name: "broadcast" 
    i: 1
  }
}

I would like to change the model so that the broadcast will be disabled, since it isn't supported by snpe and my tensors have the same shape anyway.
Can you please advice how do I do this?

Thanks!

Can you please advice how do I do this?
Thanks!
body:
I have a trained model stored as init.pb and predict.pb files.
I load them successfully and print predict. 
one of the operations appears to be:
```
op {  
  input: "300" 
  input: "298"
  output: "301"
  name: ""
  type: "Add"
  arg {
    name: "broadcast" 
    i: 1
  }
}
```
I would like to change the model so that the broadcast will be disabled, since it isn't supported by snpe and my tensors have the same shape anyway.
Can you please advice how do I do this?

Thanks!
